body.name: COMFEE' Portable Dishwasher Countertop with 5L Built-in Water Tank, No Hookup Needed, 6 Programs, 360° Dual Spray, 192℉ High-Temp& Air-Dry Function, Mini Dishwasher for RVs, White

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 10 hrs 51 mins
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 11 hrs 21 mins
features: Please make sure the distance between your countertop and wall cupboard is more than 19.6" 【No installation needed】: Adding water manually in the 5L built-in water tank, you can put the dishwasher in any suitable place without connecting to tap water. Or it can be hooked to the kitchen faucet directly with the included water hose (Adapter included)

[ Ultra-compact Design]: The ultra-compact design allows the dishwasher to wash 30+ items（Max to 9.5-inch plates) at a time while occupying a small area, which is ideal for small houses, apartments, dorms, boats, and campers/RVs.

[ 6 Program Options ]: NORMAL, RAPID, STEAM, FRUIT, GLASS washing programs, and AIR REFRESH extra drying mode meet all your daily needs. Note: Use the standard dishwasher powders or detergents because regular liquid dish soap will cause dishwasher problems. (No detergent is needed for the FRUIT program, and RAPID just needs half of the standard quantity. )

[ 192 ℉ HIGH-TEMP HYGIENE ]: The HYGIENE wash cycle boosts water temperature to 162 ℉ Rinsing and Max to 192 ℉ which can tackle even the heaviest soiled dishes and is also suitable for cleaning baby bottles and children’s dinner sets.

[ Extra Drying & Stay Fresh ]: Circulation of AIR REFRESH removes moisture and odor, keeping your plates and machine dry and fresh for a long time. The function is enabled by default and you can also inactivate the function if unnecessary.
body.description: If you're short on space in your kitchen, a COMFEE' countertop dishwasher will save the day. No need to call out a plumber to install the dishwasher because you can connect it to the built in water tank or faucet yourself. Compact and affordable as it is, this mini dishwasher holds up to 30+ items（Max to 9.5-inch plates) and has 6 programs that meet all your daily needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOOOOO NICEE!!! Worth every penny.
reviews.reviewText: This little dishwasher is the best decision I ever made. I live in a small house that doesn't have the hookup for a dishwasher. It is small enough to sit on the counter, and its cute to look at. I like that you can watch it wash your dishes. Does a great job too. I can fit pretty much everything I use in it, and 3 people live in my house. Except pots of course, but it really does take the hassle off of your hands. It's easy to work, and set up. I've read reviews where people say that it is really loud, but I don't think so. It is quieter than your average dishwasher to me. Over all i am extremely impressed, and if you thought about getting one..YOU SHOULD :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for abit over a month. I LOVE IT!!!This dishwasher is fantastic, it can hold a decent amount, and you can fill the tank if you don't have a water hook up or you want to keep the sink faucet free to use.Highly recommend you read the manual. There's a ton of tips and tricks and set up in it for your needs. Very very helpful.Will it be a replacement for a large family? No. Will it replace the handwriting of bigger items? No. However this is perfect for plates bowls cups silverware exc. I run it a couple times a week and it's great. Barely and electricity is used. Highly recommend if you hate handwriting everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent little dishwasher - But user manual needs significant updates
reviews.reviewText: The excellent: It does a great job, and it's a nice (small) size, and I like that it doesn't need to be hooked up to a tap. It's also easy to use. The fact that it only uses 1.3 gallons (5L) per wash is also great.Could be improved a little: The instructions say to leave it slightly open between uses to dry, but the door doesn't have a slightly open position like a bigger model. It's either closed or fully open.REALLY needs improvement: The user manual is in serious need of updating and testing. The not-so-good part: There are two connectors on the back of the unit. One is where you connect the DRAIN hose, and it states to remove the black plug before doing so. Great. BUT, it doesn't explain what to do with the white/clear plug on the INTAKE connector on the back of the unit if you are NOT hooking it up to your tap and plan to manually add water via the opening on the top (answer: you leave the plug in place, and only remove it if you plan to connect the hoses to a tap). But the REALLY bad: the unit ships with Finish rinse aid samples, there's a sticker on the unit itself suggesting the use of Finish, but the instructions say NOT TO USE RINSE AIDS (and there's no reservoir for the rinse aid in the unit, so that makes sense). It's kind of nuts to tell you not to use a product, then recommend its use via samples and a sticker on the unit itself. I can't be sure, but this feels like a "left hand doesn't know what the right hand is doing" situation.Now, all that said, customer service was excellent and helped me sort out both issues (and no, you shouldn't use the rinse aid).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This counter top dishwasher is fantastic! It’s compact, cleans unbelievable, it’s quiet, was inexpensive compared to the large portable dishwashers I’ve purchased previously.It was very easy to set up. I don’t hook it up to the faucet. I find it easier to just add the water to the tank and place the hose in my sink.So far I’m thrilled with it. I’m hoping it lasts more than a couple of years which seems to be the timeline for my other large portable dishwashers.I listened to the reviewer that also recommended this item. I clean the filters after every use and use the Finish dishwasher pods-I’m leery of using anything else with my track record of portable dishwasher breakdowns.My only complaint is that the manufacturer included a powder dishwasher cleaner which I did not like but it came with the dishwasher so I didn’t care when I threw it out.I would highly recommend this dishwasher for those with limited space, limited budget and want a product that is very efficient and easy to use. If I could give it more than 5 stars I would!!Hopefully, I will be as pleased with my dishwasher 2 years from now as I am now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: I had really high hopes for this dishwasher but after having it for 2 months I unfortunately have come to the conclusion that this was not worth the money.I live in a very small studio and was excited for a bigger portable dishwasher after my farberware dishwasher stopped working.Nothing on the top rack gets properly cleaned and I more often that not have to run a cycle at least twice to get anything overall cleaned. Using different detergents made no difference I think the jets must be very very weak. At this point I expect to still have to clean my dishes a little before they can actually be set to dry.Speaking of drying… I thought it wouldn’t be too big a deal to have things solely air drying but with the price point I think having a drying function should’ve been included. It’s certainly a feature that I miss from my other dishwasher.So far I just set everything to the hygiene cycle in the hopes the high temps will get things properly cleaned but even with that setting things aren’t coming out as clean as dishwashers in the past have gotten my dishes. This cycle makes the dishes dry faster is the only other upside.I think it’s overall a good concept but needs significant improvement. I’d urge anyone interested to look elsewhere.***UPDATE***After over 6 months of use and attempts to salvage this thing I think I’m ready to give up and throw this thing in the trash.This thing now leaks and I’ve had to put towels under it whenever in use. The water hose that’s supposed to take in water is constantly falling out. I also had to get a different bucket to hold the water it would intake because the one they give you you basically have to fill it to the very top where it’s close to spilling and even then it’s not always enough.I’ve had to do other things in attempts to work with the machine that I won’t go into detail because it’s ridiculous.This thing was supposed to make my life easier and it’s honestly made things harder. I’ll happily hand wash until I can save up to buy something, anything better.
esta de lujo, lo recomiendo bastante, funciona bastante, aun no puedo decir el gasto de luz que tendrá en estos meses pero espero no sea demasiado :S

This is a wonderful little machine, small but powerful.I’ve had it for just a few weeks now and have used it everyday sometimes more then once a day and it cleans everything perfectly.It’s small but has enough room to fit dishes for one meal for a family of 4 with just pots and pans left for me to do by hand.Would be much better for a couple or single person.I am extremely happy with it and would recommend to everyone wanting a small dishwasher

The media could not be loaded. This was for my Mom who has a small counter and apartment. It works great. Just have to figure how to load with what you have. It’s really quiet and cleans really well. Bought a valve to attach to her two so she didn’t have to fill the top or keep hooking it up. The valve just turns in and off. Overall she’s really happy.

Relacion calidad y precio esta bien, la capacidad es poca pero para los trastes del desayuno o cena me sirve bien, los lava bien y si no estan tan sucios pongo la opcion de lavado rapido y termina muy pronto, ademas lo utilizo mucho para lavar frutas y verdura, incluso lechuga y no lastima las hojas
The unit is convenient for a family or 1 or 2. Very compact! Cleans well if you don’t over pack it. Doesn’t really fit larger size dishes and plates. Good buy!
